Verses: 1 pinbu Avar Thammudaiya Seeshargalai Nokki: Idaralgal Varaamalpovadhu Koodaadhakaariyam, Aagilum Avaigal Evanaal Varugiradho, Avanukku Aiyo!
2 avan Indhach Siruvaril Oruvanukku Idaralundaakkugiradhaip Paarkkilum, Avanudaiya Kazhuththil Endhirakkal Kattappattu, Avan Samuththiraththil Thallundupovadhu Avanukku Nalamaayirukkum.
3 ungalaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirungal. Un Sagodharan Unakku Virodhamaaik Kutranjeydhaal, Avanaik Kadindhukol; Avan Manasthaappattaal, Avanukku Mannippaayaaga.
4 avan Orunaalil Ezhudharam Unakku Virodhamaaik Kutranjeydhu, Ezhudharamum Unnidaththil Vandhu: Naan Manasthaapappadugiren Endru Sonnaal, Avanukku Mannippaayaaga Endraar.
5 appozhudhu Apposthalar Karththarai Nokki: Engal Visuvaasaththai Varththikkappannavendum Endraargal.

6 adharkuk Karththar: Kaduguvidhaiyalavu Visuvaasam Ungalukku Undaayirundhaal, Neengal Indhak Kaattaththimaraththai Nokki: Nee Verode Pidungundu Kadalile Nadappaduvaayaaga Endru Solla, Adhu Ungalukkuk Keezhppadiyum.
7 ungalil Oruvanudaiya Oozhiyakkaaran Uzhudhu Alladhu Mandhai Meyththu Vayalilirundhu Varumpodhu, Ejamaan Avanai Nokki: Nee Munbu Poich Saappittuvaa Endru Avanukkuch Solvaano?
8 nee Enakkuch Saappaadu Aayaththampanni, Araikattikkondu, Naan Bojanabaanampannumalavum Enakku Oozhiyanjey, Adharkuppin Nee Pusiththukkudikkalaam Endru Avanukkuch Solluvaanallavaa.
9 thaan Kattalaiyittavaigalai Andha Velaikkaaran Seydhadharkaaga Avanukku Ubasaaranjeyvaano? Appadich Seyyamaattaane.
10 appadiye Neengalum Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyidappatta Yaavatraiyum Seydhapinbu: Naangal Appirayojanamaana Oozhiyakkaarar, Seyyavendiya Kadamaiyaimaaththiram Seydhom Endru Sollungal Endraar.
11 pinbu Avar Erusalemukkup Pirayaanampannugaiyil, Avar Samaariyaa Galileyaa Ennum Naadugalin Vazhiyaaga Nadandhu Ponaar.
12 avar Oru Giraamaththil Piravesiththabodhu, Kushtarogamulla Manushar Paththupper Avarukku Edhiraaga Vandhu, Dhooraththile Nindru:
13 yesu Aiyare, Engalukku Irangum Endru Saththamittaargal.
14 avargalai Avar Paarththu: Neengalpoi, Aasaariyargalukku Ungalaik Kaanbiyungal Endraar. Andhappadi Avargal Pogaiyil Suththamaanaargal.
15 avargalil Oruvan Thaan Aarokkiyamaanadhaik Kandu, Thirumbivandhu, Uraththa Saththaththode Dhevanai Magimaippaduththi,
16 avarudaiya Paadhaththaruge Mugankuppura Vizhundhu, Avarukku Sdhoththiranjeluththinaan; Avan Samaariyanaayirundhaan.
17 appozhudhu Yesu: Suththamaanavargal Paththupper Allavaa, Matra Onbadhuper Enge?
18 dhevanai Magimaippaduththugiradharku, Indha Anniyane Ozhiya Matroruvanum Thirumbivarakkaanome Endru Solli
19 avanai Nokki: Nee Ezhundhupo, Un Visuvaasam Unnai Ratchiththadhu Endraar.
20 dhevanudaiya Raajyam Eppozhudhu Varumendru, Pariseyar Avaridaththil Kettapozhudhu, Avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga. Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Piraththiyatchamaai Varaadhu.
21 idho, Inge Endrum, Adho, Ange Endrum Sollappadugiradharkum Edhuviraadhu; Idho, Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Ungalukkul Irukkiradhe Endraar.
22 pinbu Avar Seeshargalai Nokki: Manushakumaaranudaiya Naatkalilondraik Kaanavendumendru Neengal Aasaippadungaalam Varum; Aanaalum Adhaik Kaanamaatteergal.
23 idho, Inge Endrum, Adho, Ange Endrum, Silar Ungalidaththil Solluvaargal, Neengalo Pogaamalum Pinthodaraamalum Irungal.
24 minnal Vaanaththin Oru Thisaiyildhondri Maruthisaivaraikkum Piragaasikkiradhu Pola Manushakumaaranum Thammudaiya Naalile Thondruvaar.
25 adharku Munbu Avar Anegam Paadupattu, Indhach Sandhadhiyinaal Aagaadhavanendru Thallappadavendiyadhaayirukkiradhu.
26 novaavin Naatkalil Nadandhadhupola Manushakumaaranudaiya Naatkalilum Nadakkum.
27 novaa Pezhaikkul Piravesiththa Naalvaraikkum Janangal Pusiththuk Kudiththaargal, Penkondu Koduththaargal; Jalappiralayam Vandhu Ellaaraiyum Azhiththuppottadhu.
28 loththinudaiya Naatkalil Nadandhadhupolavum Nadakkum; Janangal Pusiththaargal, Kudiththaargal, Kondaargal, Vitraargal, Nattaargal, Kattinaargal.
29 loththu Sodhomai Vittup Purappatta Naalile Vaanaththilirundhu Akkiniyum Kandhagamum Varushiththu, Ellaaraiyum Azhiththuppottadhu.
30 manushakumaaran Velippadum Naalilum Appadiye Nadakkum.
31 andha Naalile Veettin Meliruppavan Veettilulla Than Pandangalai Eduththukkondupoga Irangaamal Irukkakkadavan; Appadiye Vayalilirukkiravan Pinnittuth Thirumbaamalum Irukkakkadavan.
32 loththin Manaiviyai Ninaiththukkollungal.
33 than Jeevanai Ratchikka Vagaithedugiravan Adhai Izhandhupovaan; Izhandhupogiravan Adhai Uyirppiththukkolluvaan.
34 andha Raaththiriyil Ore Padukkaiyil Paduththirukkira Iranduperil Oruvan Etrukkollappaduvaan, Matravan Kaividappaduvaan.
35 thirigai Thirikkira Irandu Sthireegalil Oruththi Etrukkollappaduvaal, Matraval Kaividappaduvaal.
36 vayalilirukkira Iranduperil Oruvan Etrukkollappaduvaan, Matravan Kaividappaduvaan Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
37 avargal Avarukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Enge, Aandavare, Endraargal. Adharku Avar: Pinam Engeyo Ange Kazhugugal Vandhu Koodum Endraar.
